document_data.name: Thaeram Duskwinter
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaeram Duskwinter''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1373}}, the [[Waterdhavian]] [[thief]] [[Narnra Shalace]] became a spy for the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], [[Caladnei]]. Her first assignment was to spy on a number of [[War Wizards]], including Thaeram Duskwinter.{{cite book/Elminster's Daughter/MMP|313|18}}
